channel.title: Wtf
channel.description:
So I just got my fucking report card today and saw the most horrendous letter on it. I received a fucking D- in AP Environmental Science. The teacher is a dipshit and loses almost everything I give her. I fail all the tests (so do all my classmates) because she doesn't fucking teach and has no capability to do so; all we ever talk about is the news. "News relating to the environment." I'm so fucking pissed right now because I've never gotten anything lower than a B in any class. She blames me and other students for "not handing in our work" when she loses the shit. I need to get into college and this asshole is killing my chances. Midyear reports are being sent out soon and when colleges see a fucking D- on my report card, it won't end well. I've tried talking to her and my guidance counselor but "she can't do anything" about it, so I'm basically screwed. She thinks she can be all bitchy because she's pregnant and I can't wait until she leaves in March. Fuck her.
I just had to rant, sorry.

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:56, topic:381204”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=477018.msg3497682#msg3497682 date=1297470695]

I talked to my teacher today and forced a B out of her.

how exactly?

tie her up and make her watch the trololo song?
[/quote]
you don’t even need to tie her up, the song paralyzes anybody who is not sufficiently trained in the art of defense against the power of trolololo.[/quote]
I am, im also very fluent in troll. (The language.)

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xxxxxx 13, post:51, topic:381204”]That has nothing to do with this thread?? ytuio9.

Also best thing you can do is go to your school district with a complaint.

As to help relieve your fears. Universities don’t get records of your individual grades. Just the grade averages at the end of each term. In addition. They dont care about mid term grades. The only thing they look at are the final grade average for the class.
Source: I work for a college admissions office[/quote]
Sorry, wrong thread.
/Headdesk

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

That has nothing to do with this thread?? ytuio9.

Also best thing you can do is go to your school district with a complaint.

As to help relieve your fears. Universities don’t get records of your individual grades. Just the grade averages at the end of each term. In addition. They dont care about mid term grades. The only thing they look at are the final grade average for the class.
Source: I work for a college admissions office
